title: Money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010
summary: This chart shows the Money in million of Pounds that was spent on higher education in different Continent in 200 .
\n\\n Asia spent the most Money on higher education in 200 with around 320 million Pounds being spent .
North_America then spent the next highest amount with 200 million Pounds and Europe spent half that with 100 million Pounds being spent .
gold: This graph explores the money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010 . The amount is in millions pounds . Asia spent £ 320 m which is 3 x more than europes total of £ 100 m .
